user_question: How do deep-sea hydrothermal vents support life in the absence of sunlight?
final_answer: Deep-sea hydrothermal vents support life through chemosynthesis, where bacteria convert chemicals like hydrogen sulfide into energy, forming the base of the ecosystem.
